<h2 align="center" id="heading">**Welcome to the <br> California Chapter for the Society for Freshwater Science <br> & California Aquatic Bioassessment Workgroup!**</h2>

<br>

## Current News

The CalSFS-CABW meeting will be held virtually on October 12-13, 2021. Visit the [CABW page](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/water_issues/programs/swamp/bioassessment/training.html#cabw) to register for the meeting and submit your abstracts for posters and talks!

Dates and Deadlines:

* 2021-10-13 - [CalSFS-CABW Meeting](2021_agenda.html) Day 2
* 2021-10-12 - [CalSFS-CABW Meeting](2021_agenda.html) Day 1
* 2021-10-11 - Registration deadline. ([Register here!](https://waterboards.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_5ln2IwFfTNOi0-vYScP0wQ))
* 2021-09-05 - Late-breaking poster abstract deadline
* 2021-07-30 - Talk/Poster abstract deadline 

*Learn more about CalSFS by visiting the [Society for Freshwater Science's Cal-Chapter page](https://freshwater-science.org/my-sfs/chapters/california).*
